json cv

json resume is super cool. but it is missing quite a few things that are needed for an academic cv. json cv provides some notes and a starting point for extending json resume with additional entries for academic contexts.

  • View On GitHub

This project is maintained by dmcwo

Looking at ways to extend json resume to cover more of the common elements in an academic cv.
